snippet.title: Fenix Furia - Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Gamers feeling the need for adrenaline-laced speed with a side of delicious cookies, get ready!  Fenix Furia is coming on June 8th on PlayStation®4!

Fenix’s village was decimated by a huge explosion, leaving only our hero and the mysterious Oktarus. As Fenix, track down this shadowy villain through nine worlds, defeating brutal bosses and hundreds of minions bent on your destruction. 

http://www.fenixrage.com/

Copyright © Green Lava Studios S.A.
